revision.comment: Created page with "{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SanDisk |model=ibi |revision=(H2C) |fcc_date=06/05/2018 |manuf_country=Thailand |is_manuf=No |type=wireless 'cloud' storage device |fcc_id=2A..."
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SanDisk |model=ibi |revision=(H2C) |fcc_date=06/05/2018 |manuf_country=Thailand |is_manuf=No |type=wireless 'cloud' storage device |fcc_id=2APRXH2C |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTD1295PB;RTD1295PB, H412TE1, GH27A1 TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q80DVSNIG |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16EP-EK |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=SATA, USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85742-11;SKY11, 85742, 0H00P;2;, |flags=Bluetooth LE, heatsink, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} The Top Side Marking of the Winbond W25Q80DVSNIG flash chip is simply 25Q80DVNIG ([https://www.winbond.com/resource-files/w25q80dv_revg_07212015.pdf Datasheet]).
Multiple Western Digital WD Blue hard drive models are pictured in the FCC photos for the H2C: * 1 TB - WD10SPZx * 2 TB - WD20SPZX * 4 TB - WD40NPZZ
This FCC entry covers the [[SanDisk ibi (H3C)|H3C]] models and the H2C model with differences described below.
{| class="wikitable" |- !Model !HDD Capacity !AC Adapter !USB 3.0 !RAM |- |H2C |1TB/2TB/4TB |12V / 1.5A |Yes |1 GB |- |[[SanDisk ibi (H3C)|H3C]] |500GB |12V / 1.0A |No |512 MB |}
